func:
node.error('njoinChannelInfo is equal 0, go next...');

name: INITIAL_INDEX_NJOIN_CHANNEL
INCREASE_INDEX_NJOIN_CHANNEL
func:
msg.indexNjoinChannel++;
return msg;

name: END_LOOP
func:
node.error('End Njoin Channel Loop.');
return msg;

name: INITIAL_NJOIN_CHANNEL_BEFORE_PROCESS
PAGE_TOKEN_VALID
func:
node.error('Page Token: '+msg.processNjoinChannel._source.id+' is VALID.');

return msg;

name: PAGE_TOKEN_INVALID
func:
node.error('Page Token: '+msg.processNjoinChannel._source.id+' is INVALID. Prepare to DELETE.');

return msg;

name: SET_NJOIN_CHANNEL_DOC_ID
Temp njoin channel is not empty?
Temp join channel is empty
INIT_PAGE_DATA_TO_CREATE
func:
msg.temp_facebook_channel_config = msg.tempNjoinChannelInfo;

return msg;

name: PROCESS_DONE
func:
node.error('Process DONE.');

return msg;

name: REMOVE_CONTEXT_GLOBAL
CHANGE_SERVER_STATUS
INIT_PAYLOAD
DEV
ALPHA
BETA
Check required fields
echo payload back
ALWAYS_APPROVE
Init file content and filename
func:
let env = msg.env

msg.payload = `

#!/bin/sh

# Install npm
echo " Installing npm..."
sudo apt update
apt -y install npm

# Install NodeJS 8.x
echo " Installing nodejs..."
curl -sL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_8.x | sudo -E bash -
apt -y install nodejs

# Install yarn
echo " Installing yarn..."
curl -sS https://dl.yarnpkg.com/debian/pubkey.gpg | sudo apt-key add -
echo "deb https://dl.yarnpkg.com/debian/ stable main" | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/yarn.list
apt-get -y install yarn

# Install typescript
echo " Installing typescript..."
apt -y install node-typescript

# Install ffmpeg
echo " Installing ffmpeg.."
sudo add-apt-repository -y ppa:jonathonf/ffmpeg-4
sudo apt -y install ffmpeg

# Install libxcomposite
echo " Installing libxcomposite..."
apt-get -y install libxcomposite-dev && apt-get -y install libxtst6 && apt-get -y install libnss3-dev && apt-get -y install libatk1.0-0 && apt-get -y install libatk-bridge2.0-0 && apt -y install libgtk-3-0

# Setup git
echo " Cloning arislab-core..."
git config --global credential.helper store
cd /home && git clone --single-branch --branch ${env} https://6c30008265a798b84ea651f287646de07bbd98a6@github.com/arislab/arislab-core.git && cd arislab-core

echo " Creating .env.production file..."
curl https://manage.arislab.ai/createEnvFile?env=${env} >> .env.production

sudo mv package.json _package.json
sudo mv no_platform-package.json package.json

echo " Starting all services..."
npm install && npm run-script prod

`;
msg.filename = `/setupDroplet_${Date.now()}.txt`;
return msg;
